EmailTemplate.name: System Master_Sales_Email.WWSKO Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't forget to share your feedback - complete the WWSKO survey!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team -
If you haven't responded yet, please take a few minutes to complete the 2014 WWSKO Survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/WWSKO>. We value your input, and want to hear your feedback.
Please get your responses in by the end of next week while the thoughts and experiences are fresh in your mind.
Best,
The Global Field Ops Team
